title: Greg Hands – 2016 Speech on the UK and Algeria
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Greg Hands, the Chief Secretary to the Treasury, in Algiers on 22 May 2016.

But at the moment, I am in the shadow of the MP for Leicester after their amazing Premiership win.
